channel.title: themes on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in themes on Silviu's Blog

item.title: I found the best themes for my E71
item.description: I gave up finding a nice theme for my E71 long ago. Even accepted the ugly icons. A few weeks ago I found a decent theme with ovi icons and got a bit happier. Today I had time to search a bit some more and I have some of the best Nokia E71 themes I found: Ovi Blue from Nokia Conversations Aviator, Enterprise and Zen Touch from Tehkseven - those are both with sevan and ovi icons.
